horrorbullz.title: HorrorBullz HQ Partnership
horrorbullz.description: Our exclusive collaboration with HorrorBullz HQ brings together the finest in luxury bulldog breeding with cinematic inspiration. Each dog carries the legacy of legendary film characters.

characters.name: Joker
characters.description: The charismatic unpredictability of the legendary villain, embodied in chocolate and tan coloring.

characters.name: Hannibal Lecter
characters.description: Sophisticated darkness and commanding presence in dark brindle coloring.

characters.name: The Substance
characters.description: Pure elegance and ethereal beauty in cream and white coloring.

characters.name: American Psycho
characters.description: Luxury breeding standards and premium genetics.
